title: Why Does Schizophrenia Develop at Late Adolescence?: A Cognitive-Developmental Approach to Psychosis. By C. Harrop and P. Trower. (Pp. 222, incl. references and index; $59.95; ISBN 0-470-84878-2.) John Wiley & Sons Ltd. 2003.
